thought: The AI reminder generation action (action_3) currently has empty params, which may cause it to not function properly. We need to set the 'messages' parameter to pass the input messages to the AI model.
plan: Set 'messages' param in action_3 to '={{$json["messages"]}}' to pass messages to AI for reminder generation.
Test the reminder generation AI call to ensure it outputs expected results.
Verify that the reminder emails are generated correctly for 'to Customer' entries.
criticism: Without setting 'messages' param, the AI reminder generation action may not work as expected because it lacks the input context.
